stanfordlogic.game
Class Gamer

java.lang.Object
  stanfordlogic.game.ReasoningEntity
      stanfordlogic.game.Gamer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Stoppable
Direct Known Subclasses:
LegalGamer, MinimaxGamer, RandomGamer
public abstract class Gamer
extends ReasoningEntity
implements Stoppable

Contains all information pertaining to a current run of a game. TODO: reorganize this as a running thread ("cognizing agent" model)

play

public Triple<GdlExpression,java.lang.String,java.lang.String> play(GdlList prevMoves)
Think about the next move and return it.

Parameters:
prevMoves - The moves just made, or nil if none (first move).
Returns:
A triple containing: the move, an explanation (or null) and a taunt (or null).

getPayoffs

public java.util.List<Triple<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Boolean>> getPayoffs(GdlList prevMoves)
Compute the payoffs of the game.

Parameters:
prevMoves - The list of the last moves.
Returns:
List of triplets with player's name, payoff, and a flag telling whether it's the played role.
